name: Softdot Education
vicinity: K-16, Mahatma Gandhi Road, South Extension I, New Delhi
reviews:
['Fake institute, they are totally play with the career of student ( i lost my money and time very bad experience) Affiliated university are also fake i.e Mahatma Gandhi University, Meghalya. They are cheat the international student also my degree is not valid in my country also (institute & university both are fake) Indian government why support this type of study centers?', '&&&&&', 'Fake institute. In 2014 I have done my graduation from them. Now, when I applied for my degree in University, they told me that degree is fake... They have wasted my 5 years, and that 3 yrs too.... I have them 25000 for the course. WORST INSTITUTE. And the comments given with 5 star, are all their employees..... WARNING! NEVER TAKE ADMISSION HERE !!!!!!!!!!!', '&&&&&', 'i wasted 3 precious years of my life
and 20000 rupees fees and an advance 15000 rupees fees. some one should file a fir against the owner of this institute
this is a scam.', '&&&&&', "Pathetic services they guys are providing trust me I've done my Hotel Management from Softdot institute 2014 and still I didn't get any marksheet  please refund my money I've done police complaint also but no response from them
Now I'm working with BPO just because of you guys #softdot sucks üñï", '&&&&&', "Don't reach out to Softdot, the environment of Softdot is very bad as compare to other institute. No one respond in a proper manner now. So don't go for it.", '&&&&&']

name: Skylink Suites
vicinity: H, 7, South Extension I, South Delhi
reviews:
['Premium family hotel with excellent service and amenities. The spacious rooms along with the courteous staff make up the highlight of this property. The location is perfect for work and shopping visits.

Special mention to Mr. Ajay Pandey for exceptional management and welcoming nature.', '&&&&&', 'Decently good rooms, located close to metro, bus and other shopping areas.
Service is great and would definitely recommend for the price', '&&&&&', 'Excellent hotel. Great service
The room was very spacious, clean, and had the amenities we needed. Breakfast was delicious. The people in the reception specially Krishna was really were very helpful, not just on checkin and checkout, but also supported. The location is great- very near to
South extension metro Station. I would recommend to friends and definitely staying again and again from so many times. At last but not least the owner of Skylink suites i.e Ajay also supported every time specially in advance booking and for the services.', '&&&&&', "We were unsure at the time of booking as this was our first Hotel booking in Delhi.
- We were able to reached the place easily. Hardly 300 meters from South Ex Metro Station
- Staff was helpful starting from front desk and all helpers
- Room was very good and worth the money
- Quite locality
- Good sunlight in room
- Watercooler available so you can refill
- Breakfast was good, they don't have buffet. They serve the breakfast in room", '&&&&&', "We stayed here for two nights and staff were polite and good to interact with. However our stay was a nightmare. A/C didn't work on both nights and we'd to struggle to sleep as it was humid and hot weather outside. We reported the issue next day and it was repaired promptly. But again it got broke down after few hours in the middle of the night. We discussed the issue with the staff, manager and requested to hire a electrician or provide us accommodation in another hotel but our requests were declined. At the end we had to adjust with a small cooler which wasn't helping at all. We requested for a partial refund as A/C wasn't functional during our stay but it wasn't honored.", '&&&&&']

name: Tanishq Jewellery - Delhi - South Extension
vicinity: F-44, Mahatma Gandhi Road, South Extension I, Part-I, Block F, New Delhi
reviews:
['Dear Joyti,

Your guidance in navigating the world of gold purchases has been an invaluable treasure in my life. Each encounter with you has been a testament to your exceptional dedication and generosity.

Thank you for all your help', '&&&&&', 'I am satisfied with customer service 1st time diamond purchase from here seema singh is a very nice staff supportive', '&&&&&', "Beautiful place. Lots of designs of all types available. Even more than any other branch I've seen in delhi n other cities  Staff is very helpful. Mr. Shadab guided us throughout our purchase. Thank you.", '&&&&&', 'We liked the services of Vansh here. He is very patient and cooperative. He advised us to buy good product with good design from Tanishq store. I would highly recommend him to be rated as very good and excellent. Very Good marketing skills with friendly nature.', '&&&&&', 'Hi, we had a wonderful experience shopping here. Our customer executive Ms Preeti she helped us with so much patience and cooperative. She is very cheerful and had a good knowledge about how to deal with the customer. We wish her success in future. Thank you üíì', '&&&&&']

name: iExpress Building Confidence
vicinity: F3, BLOCK-F, 108, Charmwood Village, Surajkund, Faridabad
reviews: ["It's a shoppers paradise. The place is well organised and maintained. One can have a great deal, if there negotiation skills are good. Form branded to local (but impressively good quality),home making to fashion ,you can get every possible item. And when you get tired of carrying your shopping bags, then sat down in the green spots and watch the magically cantroled chaos and relax. Must visit the food joints, they have some delectable snacks & meals.", '&&&&&', 'From Food to Shopping, it is a super great place for everything. Neither it is a high end market nor a cheap one. Many tourist can be spotted easily. Whatever your need is, from clothing to anything or even snacking. You will find everything in Lajpat Nagar. Only thing it feels a bit crowded :)', '&&&&&', 'Centrally located in Lajpat Nagar accessible by Metro is good market for all kind of shopping and eateries. All types of shop ranging from.high end shops to street shops and hawkers available. Parking is a major issue here and sometimes not available on weekends. On weekends it is very congested and polluted with ttaffic jams. Prices are on higher side as compared to chandani chowk and one has to bargain hard to get the right price.', '&&&&&', 'Good for shopping clothes at very low prices especially for women. This place also has famous street food joints like golden Fiesta, dolma aunty and many more.\nOverall a good place for shopping and eating.', '&&&&&', 'Its good only if reach early and check out by 1 pm or so. After that its a messy place heavily crowded. Good option for ladies suits n shoes however always bargain here else you will feel cheated. Govt should improve this market n make it more pedestrian friendly and remove hawkers menace eating up pedestrian space.', '&&&&&']

name: Red Maple Bed & Breakfast
vicinity: 49, Amrit Nagar, New Delhi
reviews:
['Commuting with a cab is difficult. Rooms are not ventilated, very stale, and a bit difficult to stay longer.
The staff and kitchen are very good.', '&&&&&', "Red Maple was the best accommodation that I stayed in in my 2.5 month stay in India. The staff / personnel were outstanding and went out of there way to be helpful and responsive to requests. If I'm coming to Delhi again, I'm staying here.", '&&&&&', 'Affordable and nice home stay experience. Peaceful environment.
Will definitely recommend it to family and friends.', '&&&&&', 'Stayed for 2 nights. Fantastic experience. The staffs are very friendly,humble, supportive and well-behaved. The complimentary breakfast served was yummy and sufficient enough. You can order from Swiggy/Zomato or you can also give order to the staffs to cook the desired meal from the menu available by paying some extra charges, since the place has its own in house kitchen.

Overall experience was very good. The staffs working here put a lot of effort in providing the hospitality to the guests.', '&&&&&', 'Excellent Hotel with homely food and close proximity to India habitat and scope convention', '&&&&&']

name: Bhatia Musicals
vicinity: Shop No-2, Lodhi Road, New Khanna Market, New Delhi
reviews:
['Beware, avoid this store at all costs. The owner is a cheat, he will sweet talk and manipulate you into thinking he knows what he‚Äôs talking about, but he hasn‚Äôt got a clue and just spews nonsense with sheer confidence.

Went there to get my guitar action fixed and strings replaced, cheated me, charged me an exorbitant amount and didn‚Äôt even change the strings at the end of the day (which I realised much later).

Absolute scammer, better off ordering stuff online.', '&&&&&', 'This is best musical shop that I ever reached .
Every instrument are in suitable price .
Workers behavior are also good .
I must recommend to visit once.', '&&&&&', "It's a nice store. You will get a lot of options to choose from. I bought an  ibanez GRX 55 guitar. Amazing sound quality. Only thing is the store owner doesn't give much discount. Even the guitar strap which he claimed is original turned out to be very bad quality. It broke in a couple of days. I would recommend that you first visit other stores and find out what the rates are or on the internet. Then you could visit this store.", '&&&&&', 'Very knowledgeable,
I always buy my tabla here, still even after 10 yrs, no problem,

They are able to pack it very nicely for scratch proof on air trave.

Would recommend them, they have lots of stuff. Mr Sandeep Bhatia and staff are always eager to help, they even have a dedicated auto üõ∫ person, to deliver your instruments home.

I have known this place for past 20 plus years, during my visit to India üáÆüá≥ i make sure to visit them.', '&&&&&', 'They‚Äôre all about money don‚Äôt care about music , people or doing proper business. Thugs', '&&&&&']

name: Rajesh Pratap Singh
vicinity: Shop No.4, Main Market, Lodi Colony, New Delhi
reviews:
['I would not contact them as they wasted a lot of my time and later increased the price of every article by 15-20% saying they are customizing.
Going to a designer means ‚ÄúCUSTOMIZING‚Äù. They should name themselves as a run of the mill like ‚Äúfrontier bazaar‚Äù.
Their Sherwani as shown on their website is listed at Inr 110,000/- and now they are asking extra 20000 for the buttons, whereas nowhere on their website does it show that buttons are not included as shown in the picture.
So beware, don‚Äôt waste your time.', '&&&&&', 'Out of all the high end fashion designers, Rajesh Pratap Singh is by far the best for their customer oriented approach, and geniunenly caring for the customer, and thats mainly because of sapna and her team. Thank you team RPS!', '&&&&&', 'Amazing collection. Modern Outlook towards classics', '&&&&&', 'Good Shop of Rajesh pratap singh', '&&&&&', 'My experience is great & thankful', '&&&&&']

name: Hotel Park Land
vicinity: C-169, Chandan Vithi Road, Block C, Defence Colony, New Delhi

name: Slice Of Italy
vicinity: 147, Lodhi Road, Meharchand Market, Lodhi Estate, New Delhi
reviews:
['The joint actually serves as a delivery depot. There is no arrangement to sit and eat, but the guy at the counter was helpful and allows us to have a pizza there, which we enjoyed amid a Non working AC and two heat emitting refrigerators. The pizza was good but would have been a better treat if had order online and enjoyed at home. Overall, not a facility to sit and eat but to order and take away.', '&&&&&', "Italias No 1 Pizza
New York Cake Slice
via zomato

Packaging - 2/5 ( Not at all impressive specially for cake )
Crust Quality - 2/5 ( Too dry and thick )
Food Quantity - 3/5
Cheese Quality - 4/5
Dressing sauce Quality - 4/5
Overall taste - 2/5 ( The base is the heart of any pizza )

New York Cake Slice - Its not even Slice üòÇ
( It's simple you can't merge two biggest city in one restaurant )
Cake Quality - 1/5 ( You can bake better cake at home )
Sugar level - 2/5 ( Very limited and perfect to taste )
Chocolate Quality - 2/5 ( Mild )
Vanilla Quality - 2/5 ( Mild )

- The base is the core of any pizza.

- Slice of All major cities NOT", '&&&&&', "Ummm really ! Place breeds no review. Below average. Now that we have such amazing pizza options available I don't know how they are still gaining any profit. But once had pasta her.. didn't like it at all. Pizzas are not bad.. but nothing new.", '&&&&&', 'This place is like an Italian paradise. They have so much variety of not only pizzas but also sandwiches, desserts and risottos. They totally lived up to my expectation. I always order their pizzas. I have tried all their pizzas and all of them are good but my personal favourite is Philly Cheese. Definitely a place to go if you are a pizza lover!', '&&&&&', 'Slice of Italy's PIZZA is my favourite pizza for so many reasons. I love how it always has freshly baked pizzas, how it has garlic bread that is so flavoursome and how it always has a collection of my favourite pastas. My favourite pizza is their "Farm House Pizza" and even as I am writing this review my mouth is watering thinking of the tasty Farm House Pizza! I would rate this place 5/5! THUMBS UP!!', '&&&&&']

name: Wills Lifestyle
vicinity: Shop No. F, 41, Mahatma Gandhi Road, South Extension I, Block F, New Delhi
reviews: ["Though products are good but didn't find latest trends, excellent customer service, very humble and helpful staff. But very high price, so much expensive.\n#Expensive\n#GoodCustomerService", '&&&&&', "Never trust and buy this brand.. price too high and quality too low below normal standard..its better to purchase from street market rather than purchasing from them..had a worse experience ever.. my shirt got torn just by removing a tag.. and when complaint they don't help.. never respond to your calls, messages. When you buy the product the make all the fake promises and promises to help in future bt customer care also don't respond till that time and your no queries is resolved.. let the buyer be aware .. !! Don't invest your hard earn money here.. its better to give to beggar rather than buying from them..they just know how to trouble a person.. I am regretting from buying products from here.. I am making you aware you also don't fall into their prey.. they are just money makers..", '&&&&&', 'Wills as such is quite popular brand and this shop is quite large with good collection and variety. Their trial rooms are quite unique and offers different lighting scenarios to help customers judge how they would look under different lighting.', '&&&&&', 'Well located at DLF Mall of India, NOIDA. However, lacked variety and the store did not look well stocked. The same was apparent when we asked for ladies trouser but found they did not have sizes. I anyways found a pant and tried to pay but the POS machine did not work. The store staff was nice and the manager called the store in GIP, but was still not able to get the size.  Finally managed to get the billing done in another store. Although I did buy two pants cause of the discount condition applicable, I had to get one of the pants exchanged at the Wills store at South Extn.', '&&&&&', 'A good place for shopping clothes. showroom is very big and wide also. I mostly like its logo. But clothes are more amazing than logo.', '&&&&&']

name: Woodland

reviews: ['Good service and good infrastructure and good behaviour of owner and staff. I am satisfied', '&&&&&', 'Very bad quality and faulty product. No replacement offered', '&&&&&', 'Good location. Parking available. No discount allowed.', '&&&&&', 'This used to be the best shop for shoes but now when you go inside you see no innovation. Their best shoe isn‚Äôt good enough. The old ones are being sold for 2x the price.  What a shame as this used to be a great brand some 5 years back!', '&&&&&', 'They have decent stock and most of the latest articles. Helpful staff and huge 3 floors of inventory.', '&&&&&']

name: Defence Store
vicinity: 38, Defence Colony Main Market, New Delhi
reviews:
["Hey fellow flavor enthusiasts! Let me introduce you to Defence Store ‚Äì your ultimate culinary haven. Offering an array of imported treasures, gluten-free essentials, and premium kitchen gear, it's a paradise for taste adventurers like us. Trust me, this spot is a game-changer. Come on over and let's explore!", '&&&&&', 'The best store for all your daily needs. Found all the imported goods I needed for the house. They have amazing collection of dinner sets as well.', '&&&&&', 'One of the best store to visit in Defence Colony. Got all kitchen appliances needed for the kitchen and also found all the things needed to setup a new kitchen. Shall visit again!!', '&&&&&', 'Very bad pricing üòïüòû
Decent availability of products
Great location of defence colony
Not at all competitive', '&&&&&', "Kind helpful staff all around to help and suggest.
Good store to buy regular household stuff as well as personal care cosmetic.
and the good thing  is Price is always lower than the MRP.
It has two floors and both the floor's has checkout availability", '&&&&&']

name: Khanna Jewellers
vicinity: F - 39, Mahatma Gandhi Road, South Extension I, New Delhi
reviews: ['This is a jewellery shop where the customer is treated like royalty. Designs are superb and there is a huge variety.\nThe sales person kiran is so courteous,friendly and helping.\nOverall I had a great experience there.', '&&&&&', 'Big fan of khanna‚Ä¶ genuinely saying it- finest quality & best designs. The staff makes the experience better üëçüèª Uma didi being my favorite. She understands individual taste and is quick.', '&&&&&', 'Recently visited a store and bought some jewelry for my wife. The prices were reasonable and after checking out a few more stores we found the best designs here. The store representative Kiran Rathore was extremely helpful and ensured we had a great experience. Will visit again for future purchases', '&&&&&', 'I recently had the pleasure of being assisted by Sushmaji and I was impressed with her services Sushmaji approachable manner and professional service made my visit for the last three decades to Khanna jewellers a positive one and I appreciate the efforts she always put into making sure that I go happily always with good purchases', '&&&&&', 'The quality is degraded, the bangle broke twice within a year. One gold bead was missing from the bangle, very shabby repair was done. The second time another lady was complaining of the same.... broken bangle within 6 months of purchase. Very sad, do not waste your money here.', '&&&&&']

name: Edwise International
vicinity: N-13, Opp. Flyover Above Punjab National Bank, South Extension I, Block N, New Delhi
reviews: ['I really had a great experience here in Edwise international Delhi. I had done my PTE class online from Edwise delhi with the help of MR. Umesh prasad singh Trainer Edwise overseas education consultants in Delhi branch. He is so nice and humble he guided to to achieve good score and my desired score in PTE test.', '&&&&&', 'My experience with Edwise has been wonderful . I joined Edwise to get tutored for IELTS and with the excellent guidance of my instructor Mr. Umesh Prasad Singh, managed to secure 8 band . Really thankful that I got a wonderful trainer who could help me attain a decent score and grasp the concepts of the exam within such a short period of time .', '&&&&&', 'The best abroad educational service out there!\nI got into my target uni in Australia easily, because despite tough odds I received right and timely guidance from the counsellor .\nMy counsellor Himanshi Jain is exceptional when it comes to taking care of all things. She helped me beyond her means. I just have praises for her. I highly recommend her.', '&&&&&', 'Edwise is a great organization as they assist you thought the process from helping you find appropriate universities to apply in them. IELTS coaching provides by Umesh sir is highly recommended, as he prepares you professionally and with proper guidance. I really had a great time with him and he has guided me a lot to get a good band in my IELTS exam.', '&&&&&', "I had a wonderful learning experience at Edwise while undergoing IELTS coaching under the guidance of Umesh Sir. The program significantly enhanced my skills in handling listening and reading tasks, as well as improved my writing effectiveness. The speaking course played a pivotal role in boosting my confidence, transforming me into a much more confident individual. Under Sir's expert guidance, I dedicated all my efforts to address and enhance my language skills and proficiency.", '&&&&&']

name: 3D Tattoos Studio
vicinity: 454A, Defence Colony, New Delhi
reviews:
["Gupt is outstanding. He is not just a tattoo artist. He is a pure artist. He is never in a rush. He listens. He is patience. He lets you change your mind and when you finally make your mind up he will make you a tattoo that people will be jealous. I got two MASSIVE tattoos done on both my calves and he gave me a great price for it as well. I went to his parlour all the way from Gurgaon and never let me down.  He is also super-quick.If you're looking for a real tattoo artist , he is your guy.

Thanks for the lovely ones you gave me Gupt.", '&&&&&', "I have got a tattoo done for here, it was a huge tattoo which took 7 hours. He is amazing. The very first time I met him I was quiet satisfied as my instinct suggested me to get it done from him. Later on when I got my tattoo done I loved it.  His patience and efforts were way more than mine. Don't think twice he is a great artist and at a very affordable price. He has changed my life in many way. Go for it guys go for it. Amazing artist. Worth it!", '&&&&&', "An extremely underrated tattoo parlour. Gupt Ram is an amazing artist. Do not get taken aback if you don't like the place, trust him and go with it. Very reasonable and worth every single penny.", '&&&&&', 'This is my second tattoo done by Gupt and I must say he is a wonderful artist, very patient and a good human being. Since tattoos are permanent and needs to be artistic, I would suggest anyone in Delhi to come and get his tattoo done from him. Thank U sooo much GuptüòçU R simply amazing!! I m in luv with my new tattooüòé', '&&&&&', "This place is amazing, artist like gupt should be everywhere.. he is by far the most cooperative artist I've ever seen... My tattoo took more than five hours but he never asked for a break, in the end I had to force him to grab some food.
My tattoo was completed at 4 in the morning, and he didnt even asked for a second sitting..
I love the tattoo on top of it all.", '&&&&&']
